Hero.hello: Driven by curiosity and passion for breaking, building, and optimizing systems. Skilled in full-stack and Android development, with a strong inclination towards cybersecurity, reverse engineering, and troubleshooting complex tech. Always pushing boundaries, learning new technologies, and seeking opportunities to innovate and create impactful solutions.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Take a look at what I've been cooking
Projects.jdm: Fake dealership specialized in japanese cars
Projects.os: Mini music player built with React and TypeScript.
Projects.disc: Personal bedroom blog portfolio showcasing creative work.
Projects.synthwave: A retro-futuristic 3D audio visualizer pulsating to synthwave beats.

Responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
Responsibilities.point1: Develop and maintain web applications, ensuring high performance, responsiveness and good user experience through regular usability testing and feedback incorporation.
Responsibilities.point2: Conceptualize and implement reusable libraries to streamline development and centralize maintenance.
Responsibilities.point3: Explore and integrate new technologies and methodologies to enhance user experience.
Responsibilities.point4: Normalizing data from CSV files using Python, pandas and NumPy.
Responsibilities.point5: Data extraction per Web Scraping using Beautiful Soup.
Responsibilities.point6: Collaboration with team members to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
Responsibilities.point7: Provided Technical Desk and Security support as IT support engineer at Mitel, a communication company.
Responsibilities.point8: Handled IT support tasks including troubleshooting and maintenance through TeamLease apprenticeship.
Responsibilities.point9: Worked on Android Automotive OS (AAOS) development at Luxoft.
Responsibilities.point10: Faced challenges with latest Android releases 16 and 14 being buggy and unstable.
Responsibilities.point11: Resolved driver issues with mesa and minigbm libgbm in vendor during build process.
Responsibilities.point12: Worked in music studios handling audio production and engineering.
Responsibilities.point13: Performed live mixing audio for various events and venues.

Achievements.title: Key Results
Achievements.point1: Designed and developed reusable libraries, reducing development time by 60% and centralizing maintenance, resulting in a more efficient workflow across 10+ projects.
Achievements.point2: Developed a dynamic dashboard web applications, enabling users to create custom dashboards with flexible features.
Achievements.point3: Enhanced the UI/UX of an advanced table component with filtering, aggregation, and sorting functionalities, improving data access efficiency and user satisfaction.
